Fighting between humans and Houkai, and even humans, has been going on for tens of thousands of years.
数万年来，人类与崩坏、甚至于人类与人类的战斗都一直在持续。
数万年の間、人類と崩壊、そして人類と戦いが続いている。
수만 년 동안, 인류와 붕괴, 그리고 인류와의 싸움이 계속되어 왔다.
For tens of thousands of years, the battle between humans and Honkai, and even humans and humans, has been ongoing.
For tens of thousands of years, there has been a battle between humanity and Honkai, and humanity and the battle.
msg
Under the Human Union's rise, Shicksal...The group that claimed to be the savior of humanity was annihilated.
在人合联的奋起下，天命……这一自诩人类救世主的组织被歼灭。
人類が力を合わせて戦った結果、天命……この人類の救世主と名乗った組織が滅ぼされた。
인류가 힘을 합쳐 싸운 결과, 천명…… 이 인류의 구세주라 자칭한 조직이 멸망했다.
Under the rise of the HSU, Schicksal ......, an organization that claimed to be the savior of mankind, was wiped out.
As a result of humanity joining forces to fight, Schicksal ...... this organization that called itself the savior of humanity was destroyed.
msg
Although Otto, Bishop of Shicksal, manages to escape, the humans have regained their sovereignty over the Houkai.
虽然天命主教奥托成功逃脱，但人类已再度将对抗崩坏的主权掌握在自己手中。
天命の主教、オットーは逃げた。だが、人類は再び崩壊に対抗する主権を自分の手に握った。
천명의 주교, 오토는 도망쳤다. 그러나 인류는 다시 붕괴에 맞서는 주권을 자신의 손에 쥐었다.
Although Otto, the Schicksal bishop, has managed to escape, humanity has once again taken the sovereignty against the Honkai into its own hands.
Schicksal's bishop, Otto, fled. But mankind once again took the sovereignty against Honkai into its own hands.
msg
Just like that highly developed society eighty thousand years ago.
就像八万多年前，那个文明高度发达的社会一般。
八万年以上前に起きた、あの驚くほど発達した社会のように。
8만 년 이상 전에 일어났던, 그 놀라울 정도로 발달한 사회처럼.
It's just like that highly civilized society more than 80,000 years ago.
Like that amazingly developed society that occurred over 80,000 years ago.
msg
However, the humans were unable to resist Houkai, and in the end…they have experienced their demise.

しかし、当時の人間は崩壊に太刀打ち出来ず、結局……崩壊によって滅ぼされてしまった。
하지만 당시의 인간은 붕괴에 맞서지 못하고, 결국… 붕괴에 의해 멸망당해 버렸다.
However, the humans of that time were unable to resist the Honkai, and in the end ...... they experienced extinction.

It is because of Dr. Mei's great plan that human civilization can be reborn quickly after being destroyed.
正因为有MEI博士这一伟大的计划，人类文明才能在毁灭之后迅速重生。

MEI 박사의 훌륭한 계획 덕분에, 인류의 문명은 파괴되어도 곧바로 재생할 수 있었다.
It is because of this great plan of Dr. MEI that human civilization can be reborn quickly after its destruction.

However, the Stigmata project is only the survival of the failure. The so-called rebirth is just the Stigmata terminal incubated by the defeat of Houkai again and again.
然而，圣痕计划只是失败者的苟延残喘，所谓的重生，也不过是圣痕终端所孕育出来，一次次输给崩坏的败者。
聖痕計画は敗者の悪あがきだ。再生というのも聖痕端末が生んだ崩壊に敗北した敗者にすぎない。
성흔 계획은 패자의 발악이다. 재생이라는 것도 성흔 단말이 만들어낸 붕괴에 패배한 패자에 불과하다.
However, the Stigma program is just a lingering remnant of the losers, and the so-called rebirth is nothing more than the Stigma Terminal spawned to lose to the Honkai losers over and over again.
The Stigmata project is a loser's bad idea. Regeneration is just another loser who has been defeated by the Honkai produced by the Stigmata terminal.

What's there to be happy about just reviving the loser's civilization?

What is there to be happy about when it's just a revival of a loser's civilization?
What's there to be happy about when all you have to do is revive that loser civilization?

Don't take yourself too seriously, Otto! We can't even destroy Herrscher now. Humans are no longer like they used to be, kneeling down and begging for your help!
别把自己太当一回事了奥托！如今我们连消灭律者都不在话下，人类早就不像从前，只会跪下请求你的庇佑！
いい加減にしなさい！今の我々は、律者を滅ぼすことだってできる。人類はもう跪いて君の庇護を求めたりしない！
적당히 하시오! 지금 우리는 율자도 멸망시킬 수 있다. 인류는 더 이상 무릎 꿇고 너의 비호를 구하지 않는다!

Don't take yourself so seriously Otto! Nowadays we don't even have a problem destroying the Herrscher, and mankind has long since stopped being like it was in the old days, when all they did was get on their knees and ask for your blessing!

msg

It can't be said that Bishop Otto played a significant role in the fight against Houkai. Shicksal has also fought throughout the world since ancient times, undoing many of the disasters that Houkai has caused.
话可不能这么说，奥托主教在对抗崩坏上无疑有着重大贡献。自古以来，天命也一直奋战于世界各地，消除了许多崩坏所带来的灾难。
まぁ落ち着いてください。崩壊との戦いで、オットー主教は間違いなく重要な貢献をしてくれました。昔から天命は世界中で戦い、崩壊で多くの災害を防いでくれたのです。
자 진정하십시오. 붕괴와의 전투에서 오토 주교는 분명히 중요한 공헌을 했습니다. 예로부터 천명은 전 세계에서 싸워 붕괴로 인한 많은 재난을 막아왔습니다.

That's not to say that Bishop Otto has undoubtedly made a significant contribution to the fight against Honkai. Honkai has also been fighting all over the world since the beginning of time, eliminating many of the disasters caused by Schicksal.

Well, calm down. In the fight against Honkai, Bishop Otto has undoubtedly made an important contribution. Schicksal has been fighting all over the world for a long time and has prevented many disasters from Honkai.

Now the human race has risen. Bishop Otto's unique experience would be a great addition.
如今人类已经崛起，要是能有奥托主教那些独到经验的支持，那一定会是如虎添翼。
人類が立ち上がった今、オットー主教の経験があれば、我々はさらに強くなるでしょう。
인류가 일어선 지금, 오토 주교의 경험이 있다면 우리는 더욱 강해질 것입니다.
Now that mankind has risen to power, it would be like a tiger with wings if it had the support of those unique experiences of Bishop Otto.
Now that humanity has risen up, we will be even stronger with the experience of Bishop Otto.

As long as you fight for humanity, we can let bygones be bygones, and the Human Union will welcome you back.

オットー主教が人類のために戦うと誓う限り、過去の間違いは見逃しましょう。私はあなたの帰還を歓迎します。
오토 주교가 인류를 위해 싸우겠다고 맹세하는 한, 과거의 실수는 눈감아 주겠습니다. 당신의 귀환을 환영합니다.
As long as you are still willing to fight for mankind, we can also forget about it, and the SPLM will certainly welcome your return.
As long as Bishop Otto pledges to fight for humanity, let us overlook past mistakes. I welcome your return.

msg
If you want to be the master of human destiny, you must forge your own path. The pursuit of the afterglow of the dead will only send you to the graveyard.
既然想成为人类命运的主导者，那就必须开创自己的道路。一味追求亡灵的余辉，只会把自己也送入墓地。
人類の運命の主導者になりたければ、自分で道を切り開かなければならない。死者の残光を盲目的に追求するだけなら、自分たちも過去の亡霊と同じように墓地に入るしかないだろう。
인류 운명의 주도자가 되고 싶다면, 스스로 길을 개척해야 한다. 죽은 자의 잔광만 맹목적으로 좇는다면, 스스로도 과거의 망령처럼 무덤으로 들어갈 뿐일 거다.
Since you want to be the dominant player in the destiny of mankind, you must forge your own path. By pursuing the afterglow of the undead, you will only send yourself to the graveyard as well.

If we want to be in charge of humanity's destiny, we must make our own way. If we only blindly pursue the afterglow of the dead, we ourselves will have to enter the cemetery just like the ghosts of the past.

I just didn't think the Human Union would be able to bring ancient Heishin back to life in such a short time. By now morale is rising and the countries feel they can wipe out the Houkai on their own.
